parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Combine separate 2D images to one 3D stack.
Start index for the series reader
End index for the series reader
Index increment for the series reader
Original spacing in the first dimension
Original spacing in the second dimension
Original spacing in the third dimension

item.name: LoGScaleSpaceMaximumProjectionFilter
item.description: Creates the maximum projection of multiple laplacian of gaussian filter results.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Step width from min to max sigma.
Minimum sigma value.
Maximum sigma value.
Normalize scales.

item.name: ExtractLocalExtremaFilter
item.description: Extracts all local extrema in an image.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Minium value for extrema. If set to -1 an automatic selection based on the mean intensity and the intensity standard deviation are used.
Multiplicator for the standard deviation. If automatic threshold selection is used, all seeds below (mu + StdDevMultiplicator * sigma) are rejected.
If set to a value between 0 and 1, values within the respective quantile are rejected.
Adds an offset to the coordinates of each seed point. E.g. useful for MATLABs 1-based indexing.
0 to search in 2D only, 1 for searching in 3D only and 2 for searching in both 2D and 3D.
The neighborhood radius of the local extrema search.
If detection in 2D and 3D is performed, seeds that were not multiply detected can be rejected.
Fuse extrema that lie within a small radius.
Prefer 3D seeds over 2D seeds. I.e. all 2D seeds that lie within the seed radius of a 3D seed are rejected.
Allow more than one point in a neighborhood to be an extremum.

item.name: DiscreteGaussianImageFilter
item.description: Gaussian smoothing filter. Filters the image with a gaussian kernel defined by variance.

parameter.description: Write output to disk
Write meta data to disk
Define the maximum number of concurrent threads
If set to 1, compression is used for file saving.
Switch between uint8 and uint16 result image types.
Variance of the gaussian kernel.
Maximum error of the gaussian function approximation.
Maximum kernel size in pixel.
Use the real spacing for the gaussian kernel creation.
